answers.answer: Lucky you (so far)!!! You may have missed the boat on that one but sometimes it can start later. And no I've never experienced a MS free pregnancy :-( ....but I'm glad u r though!
Lol im 7weeks and stil no sign of the dreaded morning sickness.i get quezy but otherwise im cool lol

Omg... we need to switch. I'm sick & nauseous all the time. This is my 3rd child.... With my 1st i have all kinds of sickness, including preeclampsia. My 2nd pregnancy was soooo easy, no sickness & a speedy delivery. Now I'm sick everyday. Consider yourself SUPER lucky
When my mother was pregnant with me, she didn't have any morning sickness. I have a little, but it's very mild. I'm just glad it's not worse, because that would really suck.

Ftm i didn't have morning sickness until i found out i was pregnant and when i found out i was 2mnths along so don't worry be happy cause it ain't good IMO i couldn't really eat nothing the only thing she let me eat was greens lol and I'm 26w,5d today...
That's good girl I've had 2 babies without any morning sickness (vomit) and I'm on baby number 3 with no sickness but i do get dizzy and nauseated at times...but enjoy not being sick i love it
Ive had no morning sickness too it feels weird not to be throwing up when other mothers are
:( I'm 14.4 and I still throw up.
20 weeks here and I never felt any different through either one of my pregnancies :) I felt like my normal unpregnant self. First was a girl and this one is a little boy!
I havent had morning sickness for either of mine.   Just major heartburn

I'm 13weeks and as of now I haven't experienced any morning sickness at all. I do get nauseous sometimes but just for a bit and that's it. I've also been told that I'm lucky & that hopefully I don't get it later on :)
I'm 32 weeks and haven't had any morning sickness at all either
Lucky i have oficially lost 30lbs since i was 10 weeks i am now 27weeks and still to this day have morning sickness it got better before i threw up all and everything i ate sadly but it got better
I didn't have any morning sickness with my 1st pregnancy. ..I was so happy!!:)
4th month still throwing up throughout the day , your so lucky !

Definitely lucky! This is my 2nd pregnancy and I'm horribly sick, on a combination of 4 different medications from my doctor and I'm still sick! Count your blessings girlfriend! I would love to be in your shoes :(
27 weeks and I never had morning sickness. The only signs of even being pregnant I've had are heartburn and my breasts and belly growing.
Your a very lucky mama!!! It was nausea/vomiting until I was 6 weeks then from that point just straight vomiting no warning. Lol!! Ill be 13 weeks on Thursday and this week it happened one time :)
I am 32 weeks and never had no MS. This is my 1st pregnancy. Thank goodness. The stories I hear are horrible. Let us count our blessings.
I'm 10.1 wks and no MS, I feel like my normal self little nauseous here and there but not horrible. So yes we are lucky, im also just very tired I can't wait till that goes away.

question: I'm 10 weeks 3 days and have that absolutely zero morning sickness. This is our first baby and I'm sure everything is fine, just wondering if any other mums have experienced this? (All super sick moms are welcomed to type in all caps at me) ;)
title: zero mornmorning sickness
